verbs.description: it your last chance to [V: ride] [ARG1: the kings island roller coaster firehawk] a popular kings island roller coaster is gearing up for its final rides the park announced last month that firehawk would be leaving after this season which wraps up on sunday oct 28 for everyone who ridden it in the past and wants to come back and get that last ride and even those who have n't ridden it and want to ride it before it goes away forever this is the final weekend for that said chad showalter director of communications chad showalter cincinnati roller coaster kings island the kings yourtheir stomach firehawk director of communications midwestern united states ohio midwest
